statements: SELECT * FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT destination, departure_date FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT id, destination, departure_date FROM TravelInformation WHERE destination='Paris';
SELECT * FROM TravelInformation WHERE departure_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT id, destination FROM TravelInformation WHERE distance > 500;
SELECT * FROM TravelInformation WHERE id > 10;
SELECT id, destination, departure_date FROM TravelInformation ORDER BY departure_date;
SELECT id, destination, departure_date FROM TravelInformation ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT id, destination, departure_date FROM TravelInformation WHERE departure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, destination, distance FROM TravelInformation WHERE destination LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM TravelInformation WHERE departure_date < '2022-03-15' AND distance > 300;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT AVG(distance) FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT MIN(distance) FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT MAX(distance) FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT SUM(distance) FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT destination, SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM TravelInformation GROUP BY destination;
SELECT destination, COUNT(*) AS num_trips FROM TravelInformation GROUP BY destination HAVING num_trips > 2;
SELECT destination, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM TravelInformation GROUP BY destination HAVING avg_distance > 400;
SELECT destination, departure_date, DATEDIFF(departure_date, CURDATE()) AS days_until_departure FROM TravelInformation;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM trips;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations;
SELECT trip_id, trip_name FROM trips;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE trip_id = 1;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT trip_name FROM trips WHERE trip_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, trip_name FROM locations INNER JOIN trips ON locations.location_id = trips.location_id;
SELECT location_name, trip_name FROM locations JOIN trips ON locations.location_id = trips.location_id;
SELECT location_name, trip_name FROM locations LEFT JOIN trips ON locations.location_id = trips.location_id;
SELECT location_name, trip_name FROM trips RIGHT JOIN locations ON trips.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locations;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trips;
SELECT AVG(location_id) FROM locations;
SELECT MAX(location_id) FROM locations;
SELECT MIN(location_id) FROM locations;
SELECT SUM(location_id) FROM locations;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM destinations
SELECT name, location FROM destinations
SELECT id, name, location FROM destinations
SELECT * FROM trips
SELECT destination_id, trip_date FROM trips
SELECT trip_id, destination_id, trip_date, duration FROM trips
SELECT * FROM travelers
SELECT traveler_id, name FROM travelers
SELECT traveler_id, age, gender FROM travelers
SELECT destinations.name, destinations.location, trips.trip_date FROM destinations JOIN trips ON destinations.id = trips.destination_id
SELECT travelers.name, travelers.age, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id WHERE travelers.age > 30

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id WHERE trips.duration > 5

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id WHERE destinations.location = 'Paris'

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id WHERE travelers.gender = 'Female'

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id WHERE trips.trip_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id WHERE travelers.age BETWEEN 25 AND 35

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id ORDER BY trips.trip_date ASC

SELECT travelers.name, destinations.name, trips.trip_date, trips.duration FROM travelers JOIN trips ON travelers.traveler_id = trips.trip_id JOIN destinations ON trips.destination_id = destinations.id ORDER BY destinations.name DESC
SELECT * FROM destinations
SELECT name, country FROM destinations
SELECT id, name, country FROM destinations WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM trips
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM trips
SELECT * FROM travelers
SELECT name, age FROM travelers
SELECT * FROM bookings
SELECT booking_date FROM bookings
SELECT id, trip_id, traveler_id FROM bookings
SELECT id, trip_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE trip_id = 1
SELECT id, traveler_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE traveler_id = 2
SELECT t.start_date, t.end_date, b.booking_date FROM trips t JOIN bookings b ON t.id = b.trip_id
SELECT d.name, t.start_date, t.end_date, b.booking_date FROM destinations d JOIN trips t ON d.id = t.destination_id JOIN bookings b ON t.id = b.trip_id
SELECT t.start_date, t.end_date, b.booking_date FROM trips t LEFT JOIN bookings b ON t.id = b.trip_id
SELECT t.id, t.start_date, t.end_date, b.traveler_id FROM trips t LEFT JOIN bookings b ON t.id = b.trip_id
SELECT t.id, b.traveler_id, t.start_date, t.end_date, b.booking_date FROM trips t LEFT JOIN bookings b ON t.id = b.trip_id
SELECT count(*) AS total_bookings FROM bookings
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT id, name, country FROM destinations;
SELECT name, description FROM destinations;
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT id, flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flights;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT id, passenger_name, passenger_email, booking_date FROM bookings;
SELECT * FROM airlines;
SELECT name, country, website FROM airlines;
SELECT * FROM airports;
SELECT name, city, country, terminal FROM airports;
SELECT flights.flight_number, bookings.passenger_name FROM flights JOIN bookings ON flights.id = bookings.flight_id;
SELECT flights.flight_number, destinations.name FROM flights JOIN destinations ON flights.destination_id = destinations.id;
SELECT flights.flight_number, airports.name FROM flights JOIN airports ON flights.destination_id = airports.id;
SELECT airlines.name, flights.flight_number FROM airlines JOIN flights ON airlines.id = flights.id;
SELECT airlines.name, destinations.name FROM airlines JOIN destinations ON airlines.country = destinations.country;
SELECT bookings.passenger_name, airlines.name FROM bookings JOIN flights ON bookings.flight_id = flights.id JOIN airlines ON flights.id = airlines.id;
SELECT destinations.name, airports.city FROM destinations JOIN airports ON destinations.country = airports.country;
SELECT flights.flight_number, bookings.passenger_name, airlines.name FROM flights JOIN bookings ON flights.id = bookings.flight_id JOIN airlines ON flights.id = airlines.id;
SELECT destinations.name, flights.departure_date, flights.departure_time FROM destinations JOIN flights ON destinations.id = flights.destination_id;
